column1: taos> select date(ts) from (select timediff(ts, 1d) ts from msdb.mstb);
taos> select to_unixtimestamp(ts) from (select date(ts) ts from usdb.ustb);
taos> select groupid, date(last(ts)) from ts_4893.meters group by groupid
taos> select groupid, date(ts - 1d) from ts_4893.meters group by groupid
